title: Actual full list of champions with new Splash Arts please?
body: At Worlds, I just noticed more than just Rumble & J4 also happens to have new splash arts, such as Janna, Tristana & Maokai. If anyone knows who else is gonna have the new splash art, or a link of it, please post it here. I would love to see more new splash arts. :)

replies.body: You can find most of the new splash art changes on surrenderat20.net which is a site for all impending updates and patches that may be added to the live server. I recommend checking this site frequently for more information on balance changes to champion, the new Summoners Rift, as well as splash arts :). The new splashes to Janna, Rumble, etc can be found a few articles down from the first one. As well, check even older articles for even more splash art changes that you may not have noticed :)
